## LinkedReferenceCounter class

A reference counted object that can be nested.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class LinkedReferenceCounter extends AReferenceCounted implements ILinkedReferenceCounter 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [AReferenceCounted](./rc-js-util.areferencecounted.md)

<b>Implements:</b> [ILinkedReferenceCounter](./rc-js-util.ilinkedreferencecounter.md)
